long_description: This footprint protects your REI Taj 3 tent floor from abrasion and wear while enjoying camping and backpacking. Sized slightly smaller than tent floor to prevent pooling of water under tent during rainy weather. Attaches easily underneath tent with bar-tacked elastic loops. Comes in mesh bag with drawcord closure. Footprint will add 14 oz. to your pack. Special buy.
short_description: This footprint protects your REI Taj 3 tent floor from abrasion and wear while enjoying camping and backpacking.
